sentence.Network_en: Lithe ribbon - dancers with zither - strumming and pipa - plucking ladies as backup? Done that.

sentence.Network_en: Daming and Lingling can play the zither, too.
sentence.Network_cn: 大明和玲玲也会弹古筝.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from German, from Latin cithara (see cittern)

entry.tran: 齐特琴（以双手拨奏的扁平匣型弦乐器）
entry.def: A zither is a musical instrument which consists of two sets of strings stretched over a flat box. You play the zither by pulling the strings with both hands.

means.word_mean: 1. a musical stringed instrument with strings stretch over a flat sounding box; it is laid flat and played with a plectrum and with fingers
